argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clatlubcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | clatlubcl.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` K ) e. _V |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( S e. ~P B <-> S C_ B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimpri | |- ( S C_ B -> S e. ~P B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> S e. ~P B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( glb ` K ) = ( glb ` K ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_isclat | |- ( K e. CLat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom ( glb ` K ) = ~P B ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom ( glb ` K ) = ~P B ) ) -> dom U = ~P B ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylbi | |- ( K e. CLat -> dom U = ~P B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> dom U = ~P B ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> S e. dom U ) |
